title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: When performing a 'copy package' in jdt.ui, the package 'ui' is included in the resulting package 'xx'. The expected behavior should be that the resulting package is 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
OB: The resulting package 'xx' contains a package called 'ui'.
SR: To fix this issue, ensure that the 'copy package' operation in jdt.ui correctly creates the resulting package as 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' instead of including the 'ui' package.
